nodes.text: ArrGack was the Chief Tax Chaplain of the Ugor species. He and his underling, GrrKack, were bribed by the Alliance shuttle Bonderium for entrance into the Paradise Sector. L9-G8, head chef of Bonderium, instructed Bonderium's crew on how to make an Ugorian feast, which included: single-celery soda, spirogyra gelatin, glazed glucose pate, free-floating fungal fondu, mitochondria crunchy surprise, and photo-lipids in brazened fatty-acid sauce.
